item.title: Author ranking on WordiZ – November 2013
item.description:
The number of users on WordiZ.it went over 260 in November, which makes more or less 16 000 articles saved in our database. It is really great and we are proud of your engagement. Because this little community also allow us to give out some statistics, here is the top 10 authors on WordiZ.

  1. Jean-Marc Manach : French journalist – ZImpact score = 45
  2. David Amerland : British Author/Speaker – ZImpact score = 44
  3. Olivier Duffez : French SEO consultant – ZImpact score = 41
  4. Mark Traphagen : American SEO/Webmarketing consultant – ZImpact score = 38
  5. Haydée Bouscasse : French Travel Blogger – ZImpact score = 32
  6. Ann Smarty : American Blogger and SEO Consultant – ZImpact Score = 30
  7. Fatima Martinez Lopez : Spanish Social Media Speaker/Teacher – ZImpact Score = 29
  8. Jeremy Benmoussa : French Social Media Blogger – ZImpact score = 25
  9. Carlos Pizcos : Spanish Social Media Teacher – ZImpact score = 24
  10. Gabriel Dabi-Schwebel  : French Webmarketing Consultant – ZImpact Score = 23

Congratulation to all of you.

This ranking is only temporary… we still have three weeks before the next one. Do you want to challenge the best influencers and compare your score ? Sign on WordiZ.it and just wait until we crawl your websites….
